texts.textentryhtml: artist's bequest to her companion, Mathilde Vallet, 1927; Mathilde X [i.e., Vallet] sale, Paris, 1931 (?), no. 32; William Michel; purchased by Dan Fellows Platt, 1931 (pencil note on verso).
